name: integration
author: Prosopo

scripts.clean: find . -name "node_modules" -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name "build" -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && rm -f package-lock.json
scripts.build: npm run build:contract && yarn run build:provider && yarn run build:procaptcha && yarn run build:procaptcha-react
scripts.build:contract: npm --workspace @prosopo/contract run clean && npm --workspace @prosopo/contract run build
scripts.build:provider: npm --workspace @prosopo/provider run clean && npm --workspace @prosopo/provider run build
scripts.build:procaptcha: npm --workspace @prosopo/procaptcha run clean && npm --workspace @prosopo/procaptcha run build
scripts.build:procaptcha-react: npm --workspace @prosopo/procaptcha-react run clean && npm --workspace @prosopo/procaptcha-react run build
scripts.lint: yarn workspace @prosopo/provider run eslint --fix src && yarn workspace @prosopo/contract run eslint --fix src
scripts.git-sync: git submodule foreach -q --recursive 'git switch $(git config -f $toplevel/.gitmodules submodule.$name.branch || echo master)'

description: Integrates protocol and provider for development purposes
